source.name: Climate Reference Network Soilsip01 Product
source.description: The U.S. Climate Reference Network is designed specifically to monitor national climate change with best scientific practice and adherence to the accepted principles of climate observations. USCRN  hourly soil moisture and soil temperature data are available in the Soilsip01 file set for all stations in the network which are equipped with soil sensors, and have completed an evaluation process currently lasting 240 days from installation.
